MIME (Multipurpose Internet Mail Extensions) Part Three: Message Header Extensions for Non-ASCII Text

comments.creator: rsx11m.pub@gmail.com
comments.raw_text: Per discussion in bug 672424, this meta should also cover cases where a "mild" violation of the standard by incoming messages leads to unparsed headers, though such syntactical issues could be resolved where they are unambiguous and in turn wouldn't introduce problems with parsing correctly formed headers.
comments.text: Per discussion in bug 672424, this meta should also cover cases where a "mild" violation of the standard by incoming messages leads to unparsed headers, though such syntactical issues could be resolved where they are unambiguous and in turn wouldn't introduce problems with parsing correctly formed headers.

comments.raw_text: Agreed. Feel free to add these :-)
comments.text: Agreed. Feel free to add these :-)
